root.name: Adventure Island II: Aliens in Paradise
root.description: OverviewAdventure Island II: Aliens in Paradise is the sequel to the game Adventure Island. The game was released in February 1991 in The United States and on April 26 the same year it was released in Japan. The European version wasn't released until July 22, 1992.The GameBoy version of the game was just called Adventure Island since the first one was never released in the west. This resulted in having the third game being called Adventure Island II. The Japanese version's numbering remained the same.PlotThe player takes the role of master Higgins, a tropical villager who tries to save his girlfriend from aliens who have invaded different places around Â Adventure Island in order to take over the world.To his help he has a skateboard, a variety of dinosaurs and a hammer.
